name: IacDiscordNotifs
description: Forward iACADEMY NEO LMS Notifications to a Discord Webhook.

GMAIL_USERNAME.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

GMAIL_PASSWORD.description: The number of processes to run.

WEBHOOK_ID.description: The number of processes to run.

WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: The number of processes to run.

MESSAGE_TEXT.description: The content of the message that will be put alongside the embed.
